actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution providing for a 5-year moratorium on railroad line abandonment.

summary.text: Prohibits the Interstate Commerce Commission from issuing a certificate under the Interstate Commerce Act to permit any carrier by railroad subject to part I of such Act to abandon all or any portion of a line of railroad during the five-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this joint resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution providing for a 5-year moratorium on railroad line abandonment.
